name: Bake A Cake (SugarChip)
description:
Bake a cake with your best friend Cat-3! Which flavor will you choose? What will your cake look like? Bake a cake and find out!

♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆

Bake a cake with your best friend Cat-3! Which flavor will you choose? What will your cake look like? Bake a cake and find out!

♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆

Bake a cake with your best friend Cat-3! Which flavor will you choose? What will your cake look like? Bake a cake and find out!

♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆

Controls: 

Move:  WASD

Let’s Bake A Cake! There's nothing more fun than baking a sweet treat with a friend! It's a little complicated but I know you can do it! Press the first letter of the named item to lift it up (except for sugar; for sugar press U). Then you will drag it to the bowl.

Example:

Flour = Press F   

Butter = Press B

Eggs = Press E  

Walk into doors, signs, and small robot mouse creature’s to interact.

♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆♡☆
